actions.id: Do a rapid diagnostic test (RDT) for malaria
Counsel caregiver on feeding or refer the child to a supplementary feeding programme, if available
Advise caregiver to give more fluids and continue feeding
Advise caregiver on sleeping under a bednet (ITN)

conditions: all_of:age_months ge 36 && fever_present==true && fever_duration_days eq 5 && rdt_for_malaria_result eq "POSITIVE"

actions.id: If RDT is positive, give oral antimalarial AL

conditions: all_of:age_months eq 6 && fever_present==true && fever_duration_days eq 2 && breathing_rate_per_minute eq 55 && rdt_for_malaria_result eq "POSITIVE"

actions.id: Do a rapid diagnostic test (RDT) for malaria

Counsel caregiver on feeding or refer the child to a supplementary feeding programme, if available
Advise caregiver to give more fluids and continue feeding
Advise caregiver on sleeping under a bednet (ITN)

facts.name: minutes_waited_after_adding_buffer
synonyms: wait the full 15 minutes after adding the buffer

reasons: The test is POSITIVE even if the red line in test window T is faint.
To confirm that the test is NEGATIVE, be sure to wait the full 15 minutes after adding the buffer.
Always check whether the test is valid.

conditions: any_of:rdt_test_number eq "1" && rdt_test_number eq "2" && rdt_test_number eq "3" && rdt_test_number eq "4" && rdt_test_number eq "5" && rdt_test_number eq "6" && rdt_test_number eq "7" && rdt_test_number eq "8" && rdt_test_number eq "9" && rdt_test_number eq "10"

all_of:fast_breathing eq true && danger_sign_present eq false && age_months ge 2 && age_months lt 12

reasons: Do not give medicine to a child who does not need it.
